body: BRAC Blog informs about yesterday's 7.4 magnitude earthquake in South Western Pakistan: "there were no casualties or damage to houses or other assets."
original_body: BRAC Blog informs about yesterday's 7.4 magnitude earthquake in South Western Pakistan: "there were no casualties or damage to houses or other assets."
title: Pakistan: Earthquake In South West Pakistan
